title: Missionary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Travel to a players house, learning their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -You will appear to be your most recent target upon death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of heretics and nonbelievers.

desc:
Post 3248
*You are a traveling priest who forces others to confess to their sins.*
